Text.Page:
You want a gilded feather? Sorry, but I made myself a promise: I don't make those anymore.

It's the downy struthio feathers, you see: The Shariar made struthio-poaching illegal. It's not worth it to me to invoke their wrath."But I already have this feather..."
You've already got the feather? Well, the Shariar only enforce the "no-hunt" law, so I guess I could make one more.<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"Great news."</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>
Sorry, but the valiant fighters of the Shariar made struthio-hunting a crime. My advice is to sell off your xermetal ore and luria fibers and forget all about struthio feathers.
